content: springtime makes me think of fun cafes outdoor markets and activities i wanted a quick-to-knit top that allows for the usual ebb and flow of our body shape and a wrap was the perfect solution wrapid is worked in one piece to the underarms then divided for the armholes sleeves are worked separately then sewn in for a more polished look stitches for the belt are picked up and worked outwards wear it over a structured shirt or a minimal camisole or tank - whatever feels right to you
